official-title.#text:
To reinstate and extend the deadline for
		  commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the American
		  Falls Reservoir.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate

under that section, reinstate the license and extend the
			 time

			 of

text.#text: Notwithstanding the time period specified in

Extension of time for Federal Energy

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: S276 ENR: To reinstate and extend the deadline for commencement of construction of a hydroelectric project involving the American Falls Reservoir.
